title: If it's December, Congress has a long to-do list: Carl Hulse & Leigh Ann Caldwell
description: Carl Hulse, Chief Washington correspondent for the New York Times and Leigh Ann Caldwell, NBC News correspondent covering Congress, join Chuck to talk about negotiations over a Covid relief bill.
author: nbcnews.podcasts@gmail.com (NBC News)
